attributes.action: Close schools during the 4 week lockdown. Keeping them open defeats the purpose
attributes.additional_details: Because keeping the schools open during the lockdown defeats the purpose of the lockdown. The highest rate of spreading is in schools and by keeping the schools open but closing businesses children are still bringing back the virus.
attributes.background: Close schools during the 4 week lockdown

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
